item.title: 极限和连续性 | Limits and continuity
item.description: 极限不存在条件：如果从任意两个方向上得到的极限不同，则极限不存在。

item.title: 奇妙随想
item.description: 我睡在宿舍的床上，周遭突然开始吵闹起来，我睁开眼，发现自己正趴在一张陌生的课桌上。我慌忙起身，感觉身上没有什么异常，两个肾也还在。但是眼前出现的却不是我熟悉的大学校园，而是一个典型中国式的中学教室。而我，正坐在这个教室从左往右数的第三组第四桌右侧的那一桌。

item.description: p = dw / dt = vi = v''2'' / R = i''2''R

item.title: 蒸汽性质 | Properties of Vapours
item.description: Substances normally exist in different phases: ##solid##, ##liquid## and ##gas##.

item.title: 熵和热力学第三定律 | Entropy and Third Law of Thermodynamics
热力学第二定律 | Second Law of Thermodynamics
item.description: The second law of thermodynamics asserts that processes occur in a certain direction and that energy has quality as well as quantity.

item.title: 稳流过程 | Steady Flow Processes
item.description: Control volume (open system) – A system that involves mass flow across their boundaries

item.title: 热力学第一定律
item.description: A closed system, also known as a control mass, consists of a fixed amount of mass, and no mass can cross its boundary - an isolated system.

item.title: 热力学基础
item.description: If two bodies are in thermal equilibrium with a third body, they are also in thermal equilibrium with each other.

item.title: 流体性质
item.description: A liquid is difficult to compress and, for many purposes regarded as ##incompressible##.
